alert.note: Alert for Central Chippewa; Eastern Mackinac; Mackinac Island, Bois Blanc Island; Southeast Chippewa; Western Chippewa; Western Mackinac (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 22 at 2:35AM EST until February 23 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of Eastern Upper Michigan. * WHEN...From this evening through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
